        public SyslogAppender build()
        Description copied from interface: org.apache.logging.log4j.core.util.Builder
        Builds the object after all configuration has been set. This will use default values for any unspecified attributes for the object.
        Specified by:
        build in interface org.apache.logging.log4j.core.util.Builder<SocketAppender>
